attributes.action: Call a general election whenever there is a change of prime minster
attributes.additional_details: Because the previous general election was largely won by the leader of the conservative party not just the party so it is undemocratic to change prime minister without a general  election
attributes.background: Call a general election if the prime minister changes

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
